summary: This is an email from August 2, 2019, forwarding a Daily Activities Report and Lieutenant's Log dated August 1, 2019. The email itself contains no substantive case information, only metadata about the transmission of two attached documents.

events.title: Daily Activities Report and Lieutenant's Log Created
events.description: A Daily Activities Report and Lieutenant's Log were generated, presumably documenting activities related to the custody or monitoring of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email Forwarding Jail Logs
events.description: An email was sent forwarding the Daily Activities Report and Lieutenant's Log from the previous day as attachments.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 2, 2019, with the subject 'Daily Activities Report/Lieutenant's Log...8-01-2019'.
The email forwards two attachments: 'Daily_Activities_Report_8-01-2019.docx' and 'LIEUTENANTS_LOG_08-01-2019.docm'.
The forwarded documents are dated August 1, 2019, which is significant as Jeffrey Epstein died in custody on August 10, 2019.
The email itself contains no body text or named individuals, only metadata about the transmission of jail or detention facility logs.
This appears to be routine administrative correspondence related to the documentation of Epstein's custody prior to his death.
